Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
MA0.Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set

Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
MA0.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop

Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]

```coq
intros m z v j Hinv H exd Hp0 Hexpo.
assert (Hj: (j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat).
  apply lt_trans with (MA0.Iter_upb m z - card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat; [auto | apply MA0.Iter_upb_ge].
pose (t := Iter (MA0.f m) j z).
assert (Hexpo0: MA0.expo m z t).
  split; [auto | exists j; split; [auto | auto]].
assert (Hbottom: bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t).
  apply expe_bottom; auto.
pose (m0 := B m zero v).
assert (Hinv0: inv_hmap m0).
  apply inv_hmap_B; auto.
assert (Hexd0: exd m0 z).
  apply exd_B; auto.
assert (Hpred0: ~ pred m0 zero z).
  intro Hpred; apply Hp0; apply pred_B; auto.
assert (Hj0: (j < MA0.Iter_upb m0 z)%nat).
  apply lt_trans with (j + card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat; [apply plus_lt_compat_l; auto | apply MA0.Iter_upb_ge].
assert (Hbottom0: bottom m0 zero t = bottom m0 zero z).
  apply bottom_B0_ter with (i := j); auto.
rewrite Hbottom0, Hbottom; auto.
Qed.

original: intros m z v j Hinv H exd Hp0 Hexpo. assert (Hj: (j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat). apply lt_trans with (MA0.Iter_upb m z - card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat; [auto | apply MA0.Iter_upb_ge]. pose (t := Iter (MA0.f m) j z). assert (Hexpo0: MA0.expo m z t). split; [auto | exists j; split; [auto | auto]]. assert (Hbottom: bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t). apply expe_bottom; auto. pose (m0 := B m zero v). assert (Hinv0: inv_hmap m0). apply inv_hmap_B; auto. assert (Hexd0: exd m0 z). apply exd_B; auto. assert (Hpred0: ~ pred m0 zero z). intro Hpred; apply Hp0; apply pred_B; auto. assert (Hj0: (j < MA0.Iter_upb m0 z)%nat). apply lt_trans with (j + card (MA0.Iter_rem m z))%nat; [apply plus_lt_compat_l; auto | apply MA0.Iter_upb_ge]. assert (Hbottom0: bottom m0 zero t = bottom m0 zero z). apply bottom_B0_ter with (i := j); auto. rewrite Hbottom0, Hbottom; auto.
